itunes:title: relationships, supplements & pantry staples | Q&A with darian & britt
title: relationships, supplements & pantry staples | Q&A with darian & britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
You delivered the FUN questions, so Britt & Darian are bringing the GAINS this week with their answers! The two sit down for a long awaited Q&A to chat about how they met, how they support one another, kids, social media, working out, dealing with finances, marriage, favorite grocery staples, balancing schedules & so much more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

00:40 What’s in store for today’s episode

1:10 Darian’s weekly recap

5:55 Review of the week

6:50 How did Britt & Darian meet?

11:55 Where do Britt & Darian want to live once Darian graduates?

13:03 Vinny’s birth story

14:20 Do you guys prefer training together or solo?

15:20 Balancing schedules & planning together

18:10 Supporting one another

20:45 Are you making your own fitness app?

21:10 Darian’s skincare routine

21:50 How Britt started social media

26:40 Britt’s social media advice

27:30 Pre-workout & supplements

31:05 Favorite weekly grocery staples

36:50 Dealing with finances

40:00 How to “do it all”

45:50 What is the best piece of marriage advice?

49:30 Darian’s parting words
